title: Movemnt freezes when playing.
body:
Whenever playing I lose movement and this make my team report me and say i'm a troll ect. The entire game is still going on but I just can't move. I really need this fixed cause this is a huge problem.
 ---
Another problem, I feel like LoL is not using all of my "internnet". Firefox would use like 2.0 mbps but LoL only uses 0.1 mbps. If there a solution to this or this is just how it is please let me know

replies.body: It does sound like you're having a connection problem, specifically with stability and communication information back and forth so you're seeing big delays.  I suggest going through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I hope that helps!
I'm having the same freezing problem. Anyone have a solution?

It's been happening for a while. I just now got to complain about it cause it's lost me some big fights recently.

Has it been happening for a while for you?
